document.full_text: standing in the middle of what was once a date palm oasis overlooking the tigris river, salim abdulla al-salim sees little hope in iraq's quest to relive its heyday as the world's leading producer of dates.
document.title: iraq tries to revive ailing date industry
lines_and_colors: standing in the middle of what was once a date palm oasis overlooking the tigris river, salim abdulla al-salim sees little hope in iraq's quest to relive its heyday as the world's leading producer of dates.
